p: This opportunity is with one of the largest publicly traded property and casualty insurance company in the world. They are looking for Machine Learning Engineer who can bridge the gap between data science models and models that run-in production. Essentially looking for someone who can take the data science models, make them ready for production, and then actually put them in production.
p.2: Ideally this person has extensive experience building end-to-end machine learning pipelines and can be a tech lead on MLE projects

li: Work closely with data scientist to design, build and deploy Data Science/ML models
li.2: Support and review code from JR level team members
li.3: Work with key stakeholders on project timelines and delivery.

li.1: Ability to deploy models into production
li.4: Knowledge of Kubernetes/ Docker a plus but not required.
